ComicInfo.Title: Stop the Station, I Want to Get Off!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:21:55. [CVDB99032] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:31:10. [Issue ID 217282]
ComicInfo.Characters: Tachyon (blue alien),Dot,Nancy Dreiser,Megabyte;,James Holmes,Cliff Pasternak,Dan Barkins [Impulse],Elizabeth Lane [Avalon],Polestar
ComicInfo.Summary: Stop the Station, I Want to Get Off!: Tachyon adapts to living on the space station. Dot and Polestar try to send a warning to Earth about what they have learned. James sends Tachyon to Earth expecting him to draw unwanted attention.
